venueName: The Watch Rooftop Kitchen and Spirits

pages.text: Skip to content Event Space Charleston, SC EVENT SPACE IN CHARLESTON With spaces designed to inspire, flexible indoor outdoor options and expansive aerial views of downtown Charleston, The Watch is the ideal rooftop venue for your next event or gathering. Get to know our unique spaces, made for bringing people together. For large parties of 10-20 guests, please . For private events for 20+ guests, click the link below to fill out the inquiry form and connect with our Sales Team. email us Start Planning The Observatory Our dedicated dining room with brand new soft seating and modular tables has endless configurations and is perfectly appointed to host celebrations of any kind, including Rehearsal Dinners, Welcome Brunches, Farewell Lunches, Bridal and Baby Showers, Retirement Parties, Graduations, and Corporate Events. Comfortably accommodates 42 or a reception for up to 60 people using both interior and exterior spaces. 600 Square Feet with views of downtown Charleston, the Ravenel Bridge & the Cooper River Request A Proposal The Observatory Terrace The Observatory Terrace, just off our main dining room, provides an intimate setting for smaller groups; perfect for seated Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch or Dinner, or Cocktail Receptions. Accommodates 16 guests seated; 25 guests standing. 400+ Square Feet of Breezy Outdoor Space Overlooking Downtown Charleston + Attractions Request A Proposal Communal Table Book one of our live-edge communal tables adjacent to our craft cocktail bar for a fun, dedicated option for smaller groups. Communal Tables seat up to 8 guests and are perfect for Corporate Lunches and smaller celebrations. Make A Reservation The Watch Buyout When it’s more space and privacy you desire, The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits is available for full buyouts for celebrations of any kind. With access to our XX -seat bar, communal tables, dual rooftop spaces, and full dining room, The Watch is the premier rooftop venue for events in Charleston. Full buyouts of The Watch Rooftop accommodate up to 150 Guests. 2,100+ dedicated, private event space with 2 Rooftop Terraces and 360 Views of downtown Charleston Request A Proposal Get On The List Sign up for our monthly newsletter to stay up to date on the latest happenings, seasonal specialities, and epicurean events at The Watch. Skip to content WE SAVED YOU A SEAT WE SAVED YOU A SEAT WELCOME TO THE WATCH ROOFTOP Your culinary introduction to Charleston begins here. Made with locally sourced ingredients, each of our dishes combines Lowcountry tradition with authentic Southern flair at all meals of the day. Make a Reservation Get Directions Located on the 7th floor of The Restoration Hotel, our rooftop restaurant offers a soulful menu showcasing a bounty of locally sourced ingredients, all while taking in a breathtaking panorama of Charleston’s architectural history. Explore Our Menus Get On The List Sign up for our monthly newsletter to stay up to date on the latest happenings, seasonal specialities, and epicurean events at The Watch. Enter Your Email Submit Submit SUNSET HAPPY HOUR AT THE WATCH The Best in Charleston is Happy Hour Sunset Hour Join us for Happy Hour specials, Monday–Thursday from 4pm to 7pm Martini Madness Martini Madness Spritz Flight Spritz Flight GROUPS + EVENTS Bringing People Together Perched atop The Restoration Hotel, The Observatory and The Observatory Terrace offer sweeping views of the city and Charleston Harbor. Our open floor plan makes it perfect for an intimate seated dinner celebration or a more casual cocktail reception. View our Event Spaces Request a Proposal THE RISE COFFEE BAR Coffee is Served Stop in and try classic brews and seasonal sips at the most Instagram-able coffee shop in Charleston. In collaboration with our exclusive coffee partner Foresight Coffee Roasters, we’ve created an exclusive blend roasted solely for our guests. Skip to content Wine Bar in Charleston, SC Sip Wine at a Rooftop Bar in Charleston, SC Nestled atop the vibrant streets of downtown Charleston, The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits stands out as a premier wine bar in Charleston, SC, offering an unparalleled wine menu. With a wide selection of wines from around the world, our guests can explore the rich flavors of renowned wine regions from the comfort of our rooftop bar in Charleston. From the crisp bubbles of a Cava from Spain to the robust notes of a Cabernet Sauvignon from Napa Valley, our wine list is carefully curated to please every palate. Ideal for those seeking a sophisticated evening out, our rooftop restaurant provides the perfect backdrop for wine lovers and novices alike to experience wine tasting Charleston SC. As one of the top downtown Charleston restaurants, we offer not just exceptional wines but also breathtaking views, making every sip an unforgettable experience. Join us at The Watch, where the art of wine meets the beauty of Charleston under the stars. SPARKLING Tempus Cava Brut 9/34 La Mancha, Spain Ruffino Organic Prosecco 12/44 Italy Veuve Clicquot Brut “Yellow Label” NV 30/120 Champagne, France WHITE Simi Special Select Chardonnay 10/38 Sonoma, California Chalk Hill Chardonnay 11/46 Russian River Valley Barone Fini Pinot Grigio 12/46 Valdadige, Italy Saldo Chenin Blanc 12/48 California Drylands Sauvignon Blanc 12/46 Marlborough, NZ Fournier Sancerre 17/65 Loire, France Harvey & Harriet White Blend 12/46 San Luis Obispo, California Robert Mondavi Sauvignon Blanc 48 Napa Valley Lingua Franca Avni Chardonnay 2022 80 Willamette Valley, Oregon RED Gambler’s Ghost Cabernet Sauvignon 11/42 North Coast, California Paso de’Oro Cabernet Sauvignon 12/46 Paso Robles, California Gurrieri Frappato 16/58 Sicily, Italy Poncie Fleurie 18/68 Fleurie, France The Four Graces Pinot Noir 15/58 Willamette Valley, Oregon Franck Decrenisse Coteaux du Lyonnais 16/58 Rhone Valley Lingua Franca Avni Pinot Noir 80 Willamette Valley, Oregon Giuseppe Quintarelli Amarone della Valpolicella 620 Veneto, Italy ROSÉ Rock & Roll 10/38 France Studio by Miraval 14/54 Provence, France Villia Sandi Rose Prosecco 12/46 Italy Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Skip to content Lunch in Charleston, SC Lunch in Charleston Served Monday through Saturday 11am to 4pm The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits brings together the best of food in Charleston with a stellar lunch menu that captures the essence of rooftop dining in the heart of downtown. As a standout for lunch in Charleston SC, our menu features an array of choices from Grilled Chicken & Pimento Cheese Nachos to Skillet Mac & Cheese, crafted to satisfy every taste. Available Monday to Saturday from 11 am to 4 pm, we provide the perfect lunch spot for those seeking a memorable meal amidst the charm of downtown Charleston restaurants. With our unique rooftop setting, guests can enjoy not just the flavors of their food, but also the panoramic views that set us apart from other Charleston lunch spots. Visit The Watch for a lunch experience that combines the delights of rooftop restaurants Charleston SC with the vibrancy of downtown dining. THE WATCH FAVORITES The Watch Classic Burger* 17 Two 4oz Patties of Short Rib & Brisket, American Cheese, Shredded Lettuce, Red Onion, Watch Sauce, Pickles, Brioche Bun, Fries Toasted Cous Cous Bowl 19 Cous Cous, Arugula, Broccolini, Mushrooms, Tomatoes, Garlic, Onions, Basil Aioli Sriracha Teriyaki Glazed Chicken 26 Charleston Gold Fried Rice, Squash, Mushrooms, Scallions, Spinach, Ginger Yuzu Aioli Crispy Chicken Sandwich 17 Marinated Fried Chicken, Pickles, Lettuce, White Sauce, Brioche Bun, Fries Burrata & Jam 15 Tomato Jam, Arugula, Burrata, Scallion Pistou, House Made Crostini SHAREABLES Truffle Fries 10 White Truffle Oil, Parmesan, Roasted Garlic & Onion Aioli Grilled Chicken & Pimento Cheese Nachos 16 Pico de Gallo, Shredded Lettuce, Pickled Onions, Pickled Jalapeños Charcuterie Board 22 Assorted Artisanal Meats & Cheeses, Olives, Pickles, Mustard, Grilled Bread Cheeseburger Sliders (2pcs) 11 American Cheese, Pickles, Watch Sauce, Brioche Bun Watch Wings (6 pcs) 12 Sweet & Spicy Lemon Pepper, Dry Rub or Sriracha Teriyaki Fried Brussels 11 Brown Sugar Cajun Dry Rub, Scallions, Alabama White Sauce, Pickled Onions Deviled Eggs 9 Dijonnaise, Smoked Paprika, Bacon Fried Green Tomatoes 14 Buttermilk Marinade, Spiced Ricotta, Pickled Onions, Cajun Remoulade Sauce Tomato & Basil Soup 10 Garlic Cream, Herbed Crouton, Provolone, Basil Crab Cake Slider (2pcs) 12 Paprika Aioli, Lettuce, Brioche Bun FROM THE GARDEN Autumn Salad sm 8 / lg 15 Apples, Red Onions, Dried Cherries, Pistachios, Arugula, Goat Cheese, White Balsamic, Vinaigrette Chopped Salad sm 8 / lg 15 Romaine, Red Onion, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Bacon, Dill Ranch, Pecorino from the garden Caesar Salad sm 8 / lg 15 Romaine, Parmesan, Herbed Croutons, Caesar Dressing Grilled Chicken Mediterranean Salad 19 Arugula. Chickpeas, Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Onions, Pickled Peppers, Feta, Oregano Vinaigrette Add: Grilled Chicken +7, Fried Chicken +7, Grilled Shrimp +9 LUNCH DISHES Shrimp & Chorizo Bowl 28 Saffron Stewed Onions and Peppers, Spinach, Scallions, Charleston Gold Rice, Smoked Paprika Aioli Skillet Mac & Cheese 15 Parmesan Bechamel, Elbow Macaroni, Cheddar Cheese Add: Grilled Chicken +7, Fried Chicken +7, Grilled Shrimp +9 Crispy Pork Sandwich 16 Marinated Pork Cutlet, Whole Grain Aioli, Bacon Chow Chow, Romaine, Hoagie Roll Mushroom Farfalle 20 Herb Roasted Mushrooms, Leeks, Parmesan, Cracked Pepper, Dill & Mustard Cream Shrimp Tacos 15 Marinated Shrimp Tacos, Cumin Slaw, Salsa Verda, Pickled Jalapeno & Corn Salsa Shrimp Roll 15 Tarragon and Champagne Vinegar Aioli, Arugula, Brioche Bun, Mixed Greens with Balsamic * Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness. Skip to content Best Cocktails in Charleston, SC Charleston Cocktails at a Rooftop Bar Downtown The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits is renowned for crafting some of the best cocktails in Charleston, offering guests an innovative menu that blends creativity with the finest ingredients. Highlights include the “Pebbles & Bamm Bamm” and “Romero’s Bad Habit,” served in an atmosphere that only a rooftop bar in Charleston can provide. With panoramic views of the city, this restaurant stands among the best rooftop bars in Charleston, elevating the cocktail experience to new heights. Positioned as a premier destination among downtown Charleston restaurants, The Watch attracts both locals and visitors looking for exceptional cocktails Charleston SC. From the invigorating “Dreaming of the Sea” to the bold “Southern Harvest,” the cocktail offerings are designed to be memorable. This makes The Watch not just a place for drinks but a top choice for experiencing the best of rooftop bars in Charleston. SHAKEN & STIRRED Espresso Martini 18 Ketel One, Mr.Black, Giffard Vanillia, Cold Brew, Simple, Add Six & Twenty Carolina Cream +2 Romero's Bad Habit 18 Lunazul Primero Reposado, Pama, Giffard Pamplemousse, Lime, Ginger, Soda Water Atlantic Crush 17 Lunazul, Hypnotiq, Oregeat, Lemon Raspberry Skyline 18 Deep Eddy Vodka, Lillet Blanc, Mudled Raspberries, Lime, Simple Cranberry Old Fashioned 18 Bulleit, Orange Bitters, Cranberry Juice, Cinnamon Simple Winter Barrel 19 Elijah Craig Toasted Barrel, Giffard Vanilla, Aztec, Chocolate Bitters, Frangelico, Simple Frosted Blossom 17 Gray Whale Gin, St. George Spiced Pear, St. Germain, Lemon, Orgeat Arctic Pom-Pom 18 Captain Morgan Spiced, Cinnamon Simple, Lime, Orgeat, Pama Delta - 9 Cocktails Strawberry Express 16 Levity Agave High Water, Charred Srawberry Puree, Lime Fly To The Moon 16 Levity London High, Muddled Blackberries, Lemon, Simple Levity "Cannarita" Canned Cocktail 12 MOCKTAILS | 10 Lavender Haze 183 Lavender, Lemon, N/A Geisen Champagne Strawberry Spark Charred Strawberry Purée, Pineapple, Lime, Simple, Geisen N/A Champagne The Dry Raspberry Raspberry Puree, Cinnamon Simple, Lemon, Geisen N/A Champagne BEER Bud Light 7 Michelob Ultra 7 Miller High Life 7 Pacifico 7 Stella Artois 7 Coast Kolsch 32°/50° 8 Revelry IPA 8 Arcade Pale Ale 8 Docs Apple Cider 8 Draft - Rotating 9 Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Skip to content Happy Hour in Charleston Happy Hour in Charleston Mon-Thurs | 4-7 PM Welcome to Sunset Hour at The Watch Rooftop, the ultimate destination for the best happy hour in Charleston. Located atop downtown, our rooftop restaurant pairs breathtaking views with a unique twist on the classic happy hour experience. Enjoy our signature cocktails and delectable snacks, from Cheeseburger Sliders to truffle-fries, all designed for sharing and savoring. As a place where good times and great food meet spectacular views, The Watch Rooftop Bar and Restaurant is more than just a spot for a drink; it’s where every visit becomes a memorable occasion. Join us for sunset hour and discover why we’re celebrated as the best happy hour in Charleston, offering a unique blend of ambiance, culinary creativity, and panoramic views.
